info.title: Axway-APIM-ELK Setup-API
info.description: This API can optionally be called to call the setup of the Elasticsearch solution manually. The API calls a flow, which is also started automatically with a defined interval. The main purpose of the endpoint as of now is to test the flow implementation/logic.

get.description: Triggers the setup and update (Index-Template, ILM and Rollup-Job) for the given indexName.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the index to be configured in ES

parameters.name: logtype
parameters.description: The log-type as it's given by Filebeat.

post.description: Creates all required indices for a given Log-Type and optionally the region. Based on the LogType the required indices are looked up in the index-config-file. If a region is given, the indices are created based on the region.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: If given, the index is created based on the given region. Region: N/A is considered as no region.
